Question: Triangle Robotics Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Triangle Robotics Co.,Ltd

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- Mobinn showcased a last-mile autonomous delivery robot that can climb stairs and maintain cargo level
- Glidance demonstrated a functional prototype of its Glide device to guide sight-impaired individuals
- Unitree H1 humanoid robot with sensors for navigation and obstacle avoidance
- Hyundai presented future autonomous mobility concepts, including autonomous construction vehicles
- AV24 autonomous racecar with an entirely new autonomy stack and digital twins for simulation training
- Embodied AI displayed the latest generation of Moxie with new tutoring functionality
- Fingervision by a Japanese startup uses gripper fingers with tiny cameras to measure grip force
- Gatik revealed the third generation of its on-road autonomous truck with "Smart Tires"
- Bobcat showcased the autonomous concept prototype, Bobcat Rogue X2, for material movement and ground-altering operations
- Ottonomy IO partnered with Harbor Lockers for autonomous last-mile delivery with physical locker infrastructure
- Lawn-mowing robots from various vendors, including Yarbo Lawn Mower and Navimow from Segway Robotics
